name: Escape From AMEXS-137
description:
Escape from AMEXS-137 is a short, point and click, first person view sci-fi adventure game. You're a miner stationed at a small mining outpost on a lifeless alien planet. A catastrophic event hits the outpost, and you're the sole survivor. Find out what happened, and find a way out.

You'll have to:
  • find your way around the outpost
  • solve multiple logical puzzles
  • find and use items

Enjoy the eerie atmosphere, and collect all the Steam achievements
